title: How to Make Eggs in Tortilla

steps.headline: Add a small amount of oil on a flat, nonstick pan.
Set the stove to medium heat.
Place the tortilla on the pan and allow oil to spread evenly.
steps.description: Add a small amount of oil if it's not enough.

steps.headline: Flip the tortilla when the tortilla turns golden or small bubble bumps swell up.
Flip the tortilla again and break the egg, placing it right on top.
steps.description: Pierce the yolk and move it to spread it evenly on top of the tortilla.

steps.headline: Turn and flip when the egg starts to turn white (or cooked enough to turn).
steps.description: You can turn down the heat slowly if you want the yolk over easy.

steps.headline: Remove the tortilla from the pan.
Cut and slice the green onions.
Add a teaspoon of vegetable oil in the pan.
Place and stir the tomato, onions, and cilantro until it boils and turn to a thick salsa-like salsa nacho dip.
Dress the top of the egg in tortilla with the salsa guisada.

text: Add a small amount of oil on a flat, nonstick pan.  Set the stove to medium heat.  Place the tortilla on the pan and allow oil to spread evenly. Add a small amount of oil if it's not enough. Flip the tortilla when the tortilla turns golden or small bubble bumps swell up.  Flip the tortilla again and break the egg, placing it right on top. Pierce the yolk and move it to spread it evenly on top of the tortilla. Turn and flip when the egg starts to turn white (or cooked enough to turn). You can turn down the heat slowly if you want the yolk over easy. Remove the tortilla from the pan.  Slice or chop the tomatoes.  Chop the cilantro.  Cut and slice the green onions.  Add a teaspoon of vegetable oil in the pan.  Place and stir the tomato, onions, and cilantro until it boils and turn to a thick salsa-like salsa nacho dip.  Dress the top of the egg in tortilla with the salsa guisada.
